overview: Boissard, a district of the city of Abymes and one of the largest ghettos in France, is in full resorption of unhealthy habitat. Witnesses to this brutal transformation, Starsky and Steeve, inhabitants of the ghetto since always, are the young guardians of the living memory of the neighborhood. Beyond the change of scenery, what has really changed in the lives of the inhabitants of Boissard?
title: Boissard Renaissance
